code: import React from'react';import{Box,Typography,Paper,Divider,Chip}from'@mui/material';import Timeline from'@mui/lab/Timeline';import TimelineItem from'@mui/lab/TimelineItem';import TimelineSeparator from'@mui/lab/TimelineSeparator';import TimelineConnector from'@mui/lab/TimelineConnector';import TimelineContent from'@mui/lab/TimelineContent';import TimelineDot from'@mui/lab/TimelineDot';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Experience=_ref=>{let{experiences}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{id:"experience",sx:{py:4,px:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",align:"center",gutterBottom:true,children:"Professional Experience"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Timeline,{position:"alternate",children:experiences.map((exp,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TimelineItem,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TimelineSeparator,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TimelineDot,{color:"primary"}),index!==experiences.length-1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TimelineConnector,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TimelineContent,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{elevation:3,sx:{p:3},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",children:exp.company}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"subtitle1",color:"text.secondary",children:[exp.position," | ",exp.duration]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Divider,{sx:{my:1}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",paragraph:true,children:exp.description}),exp.responsibilities.split('\n').map((item,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chip,{label:item,size:"small",sx:{m:0.5},color:item.includes('ROS')?'primary':'default'},i))]})})]},exp.id))})]});};export default Experience;
